entries.journal_entry_description: Find twelve angry Meatlumps in their Hideout and figure out how to cheer them up.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find 12 angry Meatlumps in their hideout and cheer them up! Use emotes that might make them laugh or feel better: applaud, blowkiss, bouquet, cheek, cheer, clap, comfort, dance, embrace, encourage, flirt, flutter, giggle, grin, hero, hi5, kiss, hug, lick, luck, smile, snog, or tickle.
